Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can draw and label different types of plants found in each habitat.
The student can draw and label different types of animals found in each habitat.
The student can show the diversity of life by including various kinds of living things in both habitats.
The student can compare and contrast the types of living things found in the land habitat with those in the water habitat through their illustrations.
The student can organize their drawing to clearly represent the different living things in each habitat.
